name: AVOPUG SHOW
description:
Don't be shy! Add to wishlist! It is free!



Welcome! If you're here, it means you're seeking something new in the world of racing.

Tired of the ordinary classics of the genre but still up for a thrilling ride? AVOPUG SHOW is a game that defies stereotypes. Here, you'll find more than just driving around tracks. We're against the same old laps around the circuit! Race through dozens of diverse tracks that will test your skills and keep you engaged. In each race, parts of the track are invisible – dive into uncertainty where asphalt materialize beneath your wheels. All accompanied by the cheerful comments of the Avocado, the streaming pug, who will support you and share some philosophy.




This game is the result of five years of development, poured with the efforts, labor, and soul of one person. It's not perfect, much like this world, but it strives to be better and bring a bit of joy into it.
